articles.author: Emma Anderson
articles.title: ‘Don’t tax Bluey’: Ambassadors to US warn against Trump movie tariffs - Politico
articles.description: Australia’s diplomat says the popular children’s cartoon could be impacted.
articles.content:
The comments come after Trump on Sunday vowed to slap 100 percent tariffs on foreign film imports, opening up a new front in his oscillating trade strategy that puzzled foreign moviemakers.
